The Mughal Fort is a Medieval-era building that increases the city's [ICON_STRENGTH] Defense Strength by as many points as there are [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen in the City, Hit Points by 25, and provides some [ICON_CULTURE] Culture every turn. It is the Indian unique building, replacing the Castle. After Flight is learned, it provides +2 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism as well. The City must have Walls to able to build the Mughal Fort.
